name: [VERY Incomplete/Unstable] LowRez Fighter
description:
A little 32x32 game (scaled up) that has a little character fighting slimes that move towards them.

CONTROLS:

Pressing Z "attacks" swiping your arm.

Pressing X "evades" giving your character no hit box

Pressing C "counters" making your character do a short animation where if your being attacked during it, you'll counter attack.

Pressing A is a test button that tests health bar, magic point bar, and exp bar.
